issue.title: [Release] Update remove old artifacts release script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17294](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17294). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I just executed the remove old artifacts release script which also removed the previously created three patch releases for 6.0.2, 7.0.1, 8.0.1. 

That's not desirable since those have just been released so I had to revert to an earlier revision.

cc `[~kou]` `[~assignUser]` `[~raulcd]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17294?focusedCommentId=17575576) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We need to discuss our maintenance policy. For example, we maintain the last 3 major releases (9.Y.Z, 8.Y.Z and 7.Y.Z).
If we have our maintenance policy, we can determine unmaintained versions automatically.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17294?focusedCommentId=17619985) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
"[DISCUSS] Maintenance policy" on dev@arrow.apache.org:
